# Portfolio Website Instructions

This is a pure React JavaScript project with server-side rendering support. The project uses:

- Vite for build tooling
- React 18+ with latest features
- useContext and useReducer for global state management
- React Router for client-side routing
- Express.js for SSR server
- Modern CSS with custom styling (no framework dependencies)
- Lucide React for icons

## Key Patterns:
- Use functional components with hooks
- Implement responsive design with modern CSS
- Use semantic HTML for accessibility
- Keep components modular and reusable
- Follow React best practices for state management
- Use modern JavaScript features (ES6+)

## Project Structure:
- `/src/components` - Reusable UI components
- `/src/pages` - Page components
- `/src/context` - Global state management
- `/src/styles` - CSS files
- `/server` - SSR server setup
